summary:
Hay guys i just wanna say im a long time member who has always wanted to give back to this community .... and iv finally taken the time to do just that.

This is my first mod called Warriors and Wizards the name says it all....
descriptionHtml:
Hay guys i just wanna say im a long time member who has always wanted to give back to this community .... and iv finally taken the time to do just that.

This is my first mod called Warriors and Wizards the name says it all....

Iv added 3 npc\'s (Followers) fully equipped with there class of weapons and armor which you can find below.

Iv also got alot more planned such as merchants,spells and more locations with custom quests.

Feedback is always welcome hope you all enjoy :)

Tarod The Great (Nord) Dragons Reach
*Equiped
-Ebony Armor
-Ebony Sword

*Inventory:
-Ebony Gauntlets
-Ebony Boots
-Ebony Helmet
-Ebony Shield

Gunnar The Great (Orc) Ivarstead\'s Inn
*Equiped
-Enchanted Orcish Warhammer with Soul Trap
-Shows you the location of a Orc strongholds you havnt dicovered

*Inventory:
-Orcish Cuirass 
-Orcish Gauntlets
-Orcish Shield
-Orcish Boots

Gidos The Shade (Elve) Morthall - Highmoon Hall
*Equiped
-Nightingale Blade
-Nightingale Armor

*Inventory:
-Nightingale Bow
-Nightingale Sword
-Raise Zombie Scroll
-Mayhem Scroll
author: Spartan
